title: Bouquet of Bemusement
Effect_1: If an effect targets you or one of your imps, you may give the activating apprentice this bouquet to have them target another player.
Flavour_Text: Is that for me? You REALLY shouldn’t have…

title: Sword of Suffering
Effect_1: If equipped: Discard lab card to destroy target laboratory component
Flavour_Text: You cut me deep, brah!

title: Brazen Bellows
Effect_1: If equipped: Discard lab card to exchange any two imps on the table
Flavour_Text: It's not THAT the wind is blowing, it's WHAT the wind is blowing.

title: Eau de Effigy
Effect_1: If equipped, at the end of the action phase, if there is at least one imp remaining in the portal, you may place one of these imps in one of your aspirators and process that imp
Flavour_Text: It makes their resolve stronger… just be sure that's what you want…

title: The Hat of Heralds
Flavour_Text:
That is one mighty fine hat. 
- some hat admirer

title: Whispering Wind-up
Effect_1: If equipped: Discard a card to move one imp from the portal directly to a machine component
Flavour_Text: The music is very soothing and then in bonks you on the head

title: Boisterous Bassinette
Flavour_Text: I would put my baby in it, but I prefer to be the one talking to my child…

title: Unsavoury Sucker
Effect_1: Receiving player must immediately discard one lab card from their hand.
Flavour_Text: My doctor says I shouldn't have sugar anyway…

title: Cluster of Chimplets
Flavour_Text: Why… would anyone do that?

title: Mystery Mixture
Effect_1: When consumed, roll d6 and take the action for an imp of that colour
Flavour_Text: He just shouted "you'll regret this!", drank from the bottle and was suddenly a marmoset.

title: Branch of Banishing
Effect_1: When consumed, pick a colour of imp and all imps of that type are immediately destroyed
Flavour_Text: Which switch is which?

title: Scroll of Sibilance
Effect_1: When consumed, return up to two imps from the portal to the supply.
Flavour_Text: WHAT? I'm sorry, I can't hear you - WHAAAAT???

title: Golem of Gears
Effect_1: When consumed draw two lab cards and play one immediately into your laboratory chain and discard the other (without gaining the discard bonus)
Flavour_Text: Two by two, my gears and you.

title: Burner of Blanching
Effect_1: If equipped: Spend 1HP for +1 imp.
Flavour_Text: Ouch… well, I didn't need that eyebrow anyway.

title: Tome of Truths
Flavour_Text:
I assumed with a name like that it actually did something.
- another happy customer

title: Pipette of Precision
Effect_1: If equipped: You may store up to two (2) imps on this card from dispensers. Imps may be freely removed from this card when recipes become available.
Flavour_Text: Measure once, cut once, take an early lunch.

title: Serviette of Subservience
Effect_1: Receiving player must give you one imp from one of their recipes. Treat this imp as if it was received via a dispenser.
Flavour_Text: Cleaning up never felt so much like robbery

title: Mug of Mediation
Effect_1: If equipped: If you receive a gift you may discard it as well as the Mug of Mediation and cancel its effects. You may select one piece of equipment from the gifting player's inventory and immediately equip it.
Flavour_Text: It's a very soothing beverage… you will feel much richer afterwards

title: Tablesetting of Tortuousness
Flavour_Text: It's passable for keeping the food from directly touching the table

title: Fabulous Furry Footwarmers
Effect_1: If equipped: Discard a card to activate this footwear and immediately place up to two lab cards in your laboratory
Flavour_Text: They look pretty ungainly, but I feel marginally swifter

title: Misfit Mirror
Flavour_Text: I could swear I didn't have that moustache a minute ago…

title: Problematic Potion Set
Effect_1: When consumed, destroy up to one imp of each colour you control to take the action provided by that imp

title: Phoney Phonograph
Effect_1: Give to target player to force target player to reveal their hand. Pick one card from the hand and replace it with a card of the cost -2
Flavour_Text: It plays such… interesting music I… hey, where's my wallet?!?!

title: Ribald Racquet
Effect_1: Discard one card to ignore up to two damage caused by escaping imps this turn

title: Friendly Fork
Effect_1: Give to target player to use the action of one of that player's equipped items (this does not exhaust the item) - activation costs must still be paid

title: Touchy Torch
Effect_1: When consumed scare two imps out of another player's machine and/or recipes (the imps return to the portal)

title: Salve of Salvation
Effect_1: When consumed gain 3 life

title: Wonderous Workbench
Effect_1: If equipped: recipes you control cost one fewer imp of any colour to complete

title: Flurry of Fliers
Effect_1: Consume to immediately sell up to three items in your inventory

title: Feather Duster of Fending
Effect_1: If equipped: Once per turn this feather duster can be used (during the IMP ESCAPE! Phase to deflect one imp (rather than the imp attacking your laboratory, your flasks or you, it is discarded).

title: Lucky Lure
Effect_1: Give to another player to redirect an imp sent at you to that player.

title: Boundless Bench
Effect_1: If equipped: you may have up to two (2) additional active recipes on your workbench
